product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Alcohol-Free Hand Sanitizer - 1.7 fl. oz.
long_description: The Adventure Medical Kits Alcohol-Free hand sanitizer helps keep your family healthy while you're camping and traveling. Foam kills 99.9% of germs on contact and keeps your skin feeling smooth and soft. Easier on your hands than alcohol-based sanitizers.
short_description: The Adventure Medical Kits Alcohol-Free hand sanitizer helps keep your family healthy while you're camping and traveling.
